General.Name: Taitien Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Taitien Electronics Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells quartz frequency control components in Taiwan, the United States, Europe, and China. Its products include quartz crystals, crystal oscillators, VCXO, VCTCXO and TCXO, OCXO, QCM, equipment, mini ovens, and timing modules. The company serves automotive, consumer electronics, information technology, and telecommunication industries. Taitien Electronics Co., Ltd. was founded in 1976 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.5, Shutan Street, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 238
